Serge turns around after being hit with the missiles and the energy blade c=
atches him across his still attached arm. The arm drops to the ground. Serg=
e shakes his head rapidly. He suddenly smiles and transforms to beast mode.=
 He seemed to be just as damaged, but not as crippled or helpless. Serge sw=
ung his tail at Freewing, because of one of his eyes being damaged the swin=
g had a 65 percent chance of misssing...

ry 15, 2001 1:57 AM

  As Fr=
eewing watches Red Bolt attack Serge, he fires 2 more missiles at serge 
  =
himself, then prepares an energon blade, wickedly curved and pulsing with 
=
  energy, and throws it at Serge.
